column4: a  41-year-old American man was found lying dead in a guesthouse on street ------516------ neighborhoods Boeung Kak ------1
column6: Phnom Penh .------Sources at the scene said the American was travelling with his wife
column7: who found him feeling unwell after he had being out drinking
column9: but the victim was found dead on the floor at around 9 pm.------According to his visa he had only arrived in the country on July 4 from Vietnam.------Police concluded he had died of a heart attack from excessive use of methamphetamine (and it is suggested he was a regular drug user).------The body was taken to Russian hospital. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/458301
